analyzed: dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  saraṇaduka

original: Nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.🔽Naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka  na araṇam dhammam paṭicca na araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With a refuge as condition, a refuge arises … (as in the first chapter) … (to be elaborated).🔽With a non-refuge as condition, a non-refuge arises … (as in the first chapter) … (to be elaborated).

original: Nasaraṇañca naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saraṇam ca na araṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a refuge and a non-refuge as condition, a refuge arises … (as in the first chapter) … (to be elaborated).

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
translated: With a cause as condition, five … With an object as condition, two … With nutriment as condition, one … With an ignorance as condition, five … With a non-delusion as condition, five … (to be elaborated).
